cscie55.project

Interface Security

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityImpl

    public interface Security
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    Remote interface that has methods for authenticating AccountInfo objects and for authorizing specific operations on individual accounts.
    See Also:
    Security

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean authenticateAccount(AccountInfo accountInfo)
      Determines if a given AccountInfo object corresponds with an available Bank account.
      boolean authorizeTransaction(TransactionNotification transaction)
      Determines if it should authorize a given transaction.
      ATMAuthorization searchAuthorization(int accountNumber)
      Searches and returns an ATMAuthorization object by its corresponding account number.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateAccount

        boolean authenticateAccount(AccountInfo accountInfo)
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Determines if a given AccountInfo object corresponds with an available Bank account.
        Parameters:
        accountInfo - AccountInfo object to authenticate.
        Returns:
        Whether it is authentic or not.
        Throws:
        ATMSecurityException - If a security exception occurs.
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • authorizeTransaction

        boolean authorizeTransaction(TransactionNotification transaction)
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Determines if it should authorize a given transaction.
        Parameters:
        transaction - TransactionNotification to examine.
        Returns:
        Whether the transaction is permitted or not.
        Throws:
        ATMSecurityException - If a security exception occurs.
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • searchAuthorization

        ATMAuthorization searchAuthorization(int accountNumber)
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Searches and returns an ATMAuthorization object by its corresponding account number.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - Account number of the authorization.
        Returns:
        ATMAuthorization object.
        Throws:
        ATMSecurityException - If search couldn't be done successfully.
        java.rmi.RemoteException
